description: Open the navigation pane to search.
Move cursor to the beginning of the document.
Move cursor to the end of the document.
Open the Spelling and Grammar check.
Apply copied formatting to selected text.
Change selected text to small caps.
Apply bullet points to selected text.
Apply Heading 1 style to selected text.
Apply Heading 2 style to selected text.
Apply Heading 3 style to selected text.
Open the Word Count dialog box.
Turn track changes on or off.
Apply subscript formatting to selected text.
Apply superscript formatting to selected text.
Select text from cursor to beginning of document.
Select text from cursor to end of document.
Select text from cursor to beginning of current page.
Select text from cursor to end of current page.
Open the Find and Replace dialog (Go To tab).
Set or clear bookmarks in a document.
Change case of selected text (upper/lower/capitalize each).
Move to the next pane or frame in the document.
Open the Font dialog with focus on the Size field.
Show or hide paragraph marks and other hidden formatting.
Move the cursor one word to the left.
Move the cursor one word to the right.
Move the cursor to the beginning of the previous paragraph.
Move the cursor to the beginning of the next paragraph.
Set a mark for use with Go To.
Move the cursor to the top of the document.
Move the cursor to the bottom of the document.
Move the cursor to the previous page.
Move the cursor to the next page.
Select to the beginning of the current paragraph.
Select to the end of the current paragraph.
Restore the document window to its normal size.
Go to the first cell in a row.
Go to the last cell in a row.
Insert a tab character in a table cell.
Copy formatting from selected text (similar to Format Painter).
Paste formatting to text (similar to Format Painter).
Promote a paragraph to the next higher heading level.
Demote a paragraph to the next lower heading level.
Expand or collapse all text or headings.
Accept all changes in the document.
Reject all changes in the document.
Insert a merge field in mail-merge document.
